original_text: Yet thou in thy manifold mercies forsookest them not in the wilderness: the pillar of the cloud departed not from them by day, to lead them in the way; neither the pillar of fire by night, to shew them light, and the way wherein they should go.
korean_text: 주께서는 주의 크신 긍휼로 그들을 광야에 버리지 아니하시고 낮에는 구름 기둥이 그들에게서 떠나지 아니하고 길을 인도하며 밤에는 불 기둥이 그들이 갈 길을 비추게 하셨사오며

sentences.original_text: Yet thou in thy manifold mercies
forsookest them not in the wilderness:
the pillar of the cloud departed not from them by day,
sentences.korean_translation: 구름 기둥이 낮에는 그들을 떠나지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: to lead them in the way;
neither the pillar of fire by night,
and the way wherein they should go.
